description: A React functional component 'QAPanel' that renders a question-answer panel with references for a user interface in a Q&A platform. It handles displaying questions, answers, and associated references, with helper functions for safely rendering diverse data types.

methods.name: QAPanel({ activeTurn })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a question, answer, and references based on 'activeTurn' prop.

methods.name: toText
methods.description: Helper function to convert various value types to string for display.

methods.name: safeRefTitle
methods.description: Safely extracts and converts the reference title or fallback to default label.

methods.name: safeRefText
methods.description: Safely extracts and converts the reference body text.
